```{python}
# | lable: generating-template
# | echo: false
# | output: false

from IPython.display import display, HTML
import subprocess

# Render the Quarto template and capture the output
result = subprocess.run(
    [
        "quarto",
        "render",
        "../../templates/report-template.qmd",
        "--execute-params",
        "params.yml",
        "--output",
        "-",
    ],
    stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
    stderr=subprocess.PIPE,
    text=True,
)
```


```{python}
# | label: display-report
# | echo: false

# Display the rendered HTML output
display(HTML(result.stdout))
```
